member.summary: Returns a data row for the specified company ID

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.AptifyWebUserLogin.DeterminePreferredCurrency(Aptify.Framework.Application.AptifyApplication,Aptify.Framework.DataServices.DataAction,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: The User's Preferred Currency Type is based on either the Preferred Currency Type of the Company linked to the Person. If the Company does not have a Preferred Currency or the Person does not have a linked Company, the Person's Preferred Currency Type will be used. If the Person does not have a Preferred Currency Type, the system's Functional Currency will be used.

member.summary: This method handles checking the number login attempts and eventual disabling of the e-Business user account after the number of tries specified has been reached.
